## Development Environment

| Item | Specification |
|------|---------------|
| OS | Windows / Linux / macOS |
| IDE | VSCode / Cursor |
| Package Manager | pip / npm / cargo |

---

## Environment Setup

```bash
# Clone repository
git clone <repo-url>
cd <project-name>

# Install dependencies
pip install -r requirements.txt

# Run development server
python main.py
```

---

## Build Commands

```bash
# Development
python main.py

# Testing
pytest tests/

# Production build
python -m build
```

---

## Directory Structure

```
project/
├── src/
│   └── package/
├── tests/
├── docs/
├── .agent/                 # AI Protocol Layer
└── requirements.txt
```
